website_summaries.verdict: Anker's relatively affordable Soundcore Spirit X2 earphones pump out wildly boosted bass from a waterproof, wire-free design.
pros: Seriously powerful audio with subwoofer-like response
Wide array of accessories for super-secure fit
cons: Wild bass response isn't for everyone
Earhooks can interfere with the temples of eyeglasses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant. Sound is fantastic, perfect for running. I haven’t worn them in the rain yet but expect them to be fine, given the claims of superior waterproofing. The charging case has a good capacity to keep them topped up. The case is also compact and looks high quality, as do the earbuds. They perhaps don’t look quite as slick as Beats, but the specs are much better, they sound better according to most reviews I have come across and they are so much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: James Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for exercising
customer_reviews.text: I bought these X2s for exercising, exclusively for use on a personal spin bike after my previous pair of wired Bluetooth headphones died (I suspect from copious amounts of sweat). So far they have been great; they have a secure fit that doesn't move for the entirety of the workout, and can fit over the headband I need to wear at the same time. The only downside I can see so far is the size of the case. This isn't an issue for me as they won't be traveling anywhere, but the case is notably much larger than my other true wireless Soundcore pair - Life P2s (pictures added to compare).
customer_reviews.author: EDTHTW

customer_reviews.title: Stylish looking, very comfortable to wear exceptional sound.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase that it seemed good for me to write a review. Stylish looking and silky smooth feeling charging case, very comfortable to wear, the most comfortable earbuds I’ve worn and with the added security of very comfortable ear clips they fit very snuggled in my ears and no danger of them slipping out. I’ve used a few pairs of earbuds with and without ear clips and these by far are the best stylish looking, very comfortable and snuggly to wear and the sound is of exceptional quality. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Defective
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the product arrived defective. The left earbud often fails to connect, doesn't charge properly and loses charge significantly faster than the right. A quick google search shows some others have experienced this sort of problem so seems a relatively common issue. If it wasn't defective, the product would be pretty much great all round. As it is, I can't recommend and wouldn't bother purchasing this again. I'll be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The piece fits like a glove and is a very comfortable fit providing hours of comfort. Sound is awesome especially with the bass up function. Call quality is crisp, clear and stable. Music quality is studio quality. Happy with my expensive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds but slight concern about durability
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately one of my ear buds stopped working after a few uses, thankfully Anker customer support were super helpful and I got a replacement set pretty quickly. Hopefully I was just unlucky, and I don’t experience any problems with my replacement set, as they are great ear buds for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracking sound - very secure
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant - original Neos were brilliant these have better sound quality and very secure around ears . Would buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones for working out and specially running
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to run with and I couldn't be happier. The sound is great, the battery lasts for ages and I never have to worry about the earphones falling or coming loose. For the price of £80 I believe they are a real bargain. I wear glasses and hardly have any problems with the fit and comfort. Sometimes just need to tweak slightly due to the bouncebon the glasses when running. If you are looking for a pair of earphones to workout with, look no further. You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Marco UK

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Love that they don’t just switch off if I pause during a run, sound quality is great and stay put whilst running too! Sent more expensive ones back that simply don’t do this.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Shame plauged by connectivity issues. No audio constantly even though connected. Have to forget device and reconnect at leased twice a week. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Used in torrential rain / sweat with no issues. Good sound quality, well fitted. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The charging case would not work and I'm having to return them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: The over-ear design offers a steady fit, and the audio is clear and punchy. Seems like a good purchase, looking forwards to testing out some more.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, microphone absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Moving from Beats, the sound is superior, but the microphone is not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Glamourflage

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: I wasnt going to buy the ear phones with just 1 review but the review was good and he was saying what worked for him and I ended up changing my mind which so far I'm very happy i did. I wanted something that I can listen to on the motorbike that didn't have wires around my head, was comfortable, had long life on one charge and I could still hear whats going on around me slightly for beeps or sirens. So far this has worked out amazingly great for me, I dont usually spend so much on head phones but I did and haven't regretted yet.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and stay put when jogging
customer_reviews.text: Got these for hubby to jog with. Has problem keeping ordinary ear buds in his ears for some strange reason. Bought these- problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: maggy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones, I use them regularly for running and they never fall off. The sound is great and the charging case always keeps the headphones charged up. They pair fine with my Fitbit versa watch but it does need repairing each time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, much more secure than my old set and the base boost is great for drowning out what the gym classes as music.
customer_reviews.author: MarkUK

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Not keen on leaving reviews but can't hold f back on this one. Took me time to decide on best ear bud for workout and normal daily need. This tested product tick all boxes. Unbelievable sound, good grip no matter what exercise you doing, even swam with mine and still standing(am not advocating same here pls.. Lol). However realised Bluetooth do not penetrate into water when u swim with this though. Easy practicability, love u can wear just only one piece if u like for normal day call taking. Long battery life. Glad I got this having tried others with little satisfaction. Good job sound ore!
customer_reviews.author: sokey

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are great, they fit snuggly and the sound is fantastic ( a bit on the bass side ) . I used these for running mainly and had no issues in heavy rain or any other condition . They also charge quickly and come in a handy case. My first pair actually had issues, the left earphone didn't charge correctly, but the customer support was great, I emailed them and they sent me a new pair right away. These new earphones have been perfect for me running. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working out
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones for working out and just doing jobs round the house. They are completely sound cancelling too. I was really sceptical at first, however they're easy to charge and fit just how I wanted. I've been in the rain and wind and they didnt move at all.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: My. Ear.  Phones. Review
customer_reviews.text: I. Having. Using theses. Eye. Phones about. Month. Or. So. They. Fit. Very. Well. And. I. Have. Had. No. Problems. With. Them. Falling. Out. Of. The. Ear. The. Sound. On. Ear v phones. Great
customer_reviews.author: Nick Badham

customer_reviews.title: Found THE ONE
customer_reviews.text: I have found my headphones. Best alternative to really expensive Beats. The sound quality and battery is awesome. It is comfortable to even sleep on. Buy with confidence. Anker customer support is amazing. Pair that with Amazon customer services. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: N Shah

customer_reviews.title: The most fabulous Earbuds everrrrr!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Earbuds!! They tick all the boxes if you love your bass like me get these!! They are bombastic!! From now on soundcore is my go to company for my Earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these headphones everyday when i go running. The sound is great and they fit very well with no danger of them falling out. Unfortunately the original pair stopped working, but the Warranty Team at Soundcore quickly sent me a replacement set and they haven't missed a beat. Provided this second pair lasts, i would highly recommend as they are a great set of earphones at an extremely reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound 👌
customer_reviews.text: Having wasted my money on the cheap £30 earbuds on Amazon before, I decided to bite the bullet and spend a bit more, I'm so glad I did! These headphones are so good! Comfy, amazing immersive sound and bass, great functionality and battery life. Great quality product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ian D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and the bass is amazing. Just the volume is wasnt loud enough for me . Not worth the high price
customer_reviews.author: Haroon khan

customer_reviews.title: Firs for running.
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well. I bought is for running and I love it. The first headphone what is very comfortable and I don't have to worry of losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Krisztina

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for sound quality just to listen music this for you but if you want to use for music + 1-2hours talk this the most terrible headphones I ever had in my life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend my son bought really expensive ones and they broke within months these are definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: karen weston

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: What a brilliant pair of headphone Over the moon with them
customer_reviews.author: Craigybaby

customer_reviews.title: Great running/fitness/workout earphones
customer_reviews.text: Wasted money on cheap wireless earphones for running and working out and they always broke after a few uses - wouldnt charge once the connector got wet. These though are absolutely fantastic! Very comfortable, sound quality is great, connect well with iphone and most of all - reliable. Havent broken or lost any quality. Charge like a dream even though I sweat a lot and so was worried the sweat would be an issue - but not at all. Bargain for the price and quality, would recommend thoroughly. Great product
customer_reviews.author: pcs1989

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: You can really tell these are quality headphones. Premium feel from the box to the materials to the sound qualitt and bass quality and even how easy it is to use them without reading the manual. I have two main issues with them. My ear canal is sore, i will try a smaller fitting and give it a few days see how it feels. Second for whatever reason, some media players have a delay of a second between sound and video. I will come up for a review in a few days
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: i bought these as a gift for someone and the feedback they gave me is as follows quality sound is very good,fit very comfortable,very easy to use,stylish,comes with a pod that charges the headphones and keep them secure when not in use,overall you wont be disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: What bass?!
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to have extra bass Rubbish I sent them back to Amazon the day I received them They sound tinny
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Superb ear buds.
customer_reviews.text: Once you get these fitted with the right size parts for your ears you'll love them.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

product_meta.title: Soundcore Anker Spirit X2, True Wireless Earbuds, Body-Moving Bass, IP68 Sweatproof, 36H Playtime, Fast Charge, Secure Earhooks, Bluetooth 5, cVc 8.0 Clear Calls, Sports Earphones For Gym, Sport
feature_bullets: 【100% More Bass】Inspired by technology found in high-end speakers, BassTurbo positions an acoustic chamber behind the driver to add powerful bass resonance. BassUp technology, then injects even more bass intensity via a custom algorithm.

【Extreme Sweatproof】IP68 protection defends against dust and water with SweatGuard technology to resist the corrosive nature of sweat. Lasts 100x longer than ordinary true wireless earbuds thanks to a submarine structure and hydrophobic nano-coating.
【Incredible Endurance】Get 9 hours of intense listening from a single charge and boost that to 36 hours with the included charging case. That’s up to 5 weeks of workouts on a single charge.

【Effortless Comfort】True wireless earbuds with extra-flex eartips and hooks ensure a free, satisfying, and invincible fit, no matter how hardcore your workout. Comes with an extensive selection of tips and wings for tailored listening.
【What’s In The Box】 Soundcore Spirit X2, Charging Case, XS/S/M/L/XL EarTips, XS/S/M EarWings, USB-C Cable, 18-month warranty, and friendly customer service.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
